block.p: In the following reports, the listed at price is the asking price when negotiations began that ended in the sale. Time on market is from most recent list
Number of bedrooms Number of full bathrooms Number of half bathrooms Weeks on market
*Sale in this price category not available.
220-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a prewar building; high ceilings, h/w floors, common roof deck and laundry room in building; maintenance $465, 50% tax deductible; listed at $249,000. Broker: Barak.

745-sq.-ft. studio condo in a renovated prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge, Sub-Zero and Bosch appliances, study, 10-ft. ceilings; common charge $505; taxes $2,520; listed at $585,000. Broker: Citi Habitats.

750-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, renovated kitchen and bath, high ceilings, h/w floors; maintenance $1,048, 56% tax deductible; listed at $730,000 (multiple bids). Broker: Halstead Property.
4-story 3-family brick town house; lower duplex: 2 bedrooms, 2 baths; upper simplexes: 2 bedrooms, 1 bath; 17-by-99-ft. lot; taxes $16,567; listed at $1.2 million. Brokers: Klara Madlin; Bond.

1,400-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining room, renovated baths and kitchen, oversize windows; maintenance $1,701, 49% tax deductible; listed at $1.695 million. Broker: Corcoran Group.
1,400-sq.-ft. 20-year-old town-house condo; dining room, eat-in kitchen, family room, walk-in closet, c/a; common charge $250; taxes $1,748; listed at $284,500. Broker: Sari Kingsley Real Estate.

Semi-attached prewar town house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, recreation room, high ceilings, h/w floors, deck, 1-car garage, 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,000; listed at $400,000. Broker: Jacqueline Kyle Kall.

87-year-old wood colonial; dining room, renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, family room, h/w floors, finished basement, 2-car garage, 40-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,604; listed at $769,000. Broker: Carollo.

1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; elevator operators, dining room, maid's room, Grand Army Plaza view; maintenance $1,667, 40% tax deductible; listed at $951,000 (multiple bids). Broker: Orrichio & Anderson.

97-year-old 4-story brownstone; double parlor, marble mantels, renovated baths and mechanicals, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $935; listed at $1.35 million. Brokers: Corcoran Group; Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue.
58-year-old cedar-sided ranch; foyer, eat-in kitchen, attic, finished full basement, front wood deck, 140-by-262-ft. lot; taxes $4,606; listed at $334,000. Broker: Manzoni Real Estate.

68-year-old colonial; beach rights, living-room fireplace and built-in bookcases, family room, attic, partial basement, 0.22-acre lot; taxes $6,910; listed at $539,000. Brokers: Coldwell Banker; American Way.

84-year-old colonial; eat-in kitchen, family room, lawn sprinklers, 4 heat zones, finished basement, heated 2-car garage, 60-by-105-ft. lot; taxes $7,836; listed at $899,000. Broker: Daniel Gale Sotheby's.

19-year-old cedar-sided contemporary; on a creek with a dock, vaulted ceilings, wood-burning stove, deck, 0.59-acre lot; taxes $10,147; listed at $998,500. Brokers: Brown Harris Stevens; Kerrigan Country.

6,200-sq.-ft. 19-year-old Norman-style brick 2-story; heated pool, living-room fireplace, family room, steam shower, 3-car garage, 1-acre lot; taxes $43,668; listed at $2.35 million. Broker: Century 21 Laffey.

850-sq.-ft. condo in a 53-year-old garden complex; entry hall, h/w floors, renovated bath, new air-conditioners; common charge $409; taxes $4,268; listed at $399,000. Brokers: Sotheby's; Prudential Rand.

13-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; direct lake access, mooring rights, cathedral ceilings, large deck, 0.25-acre lot; taxes $6,280; listed at $449,999. Brokers: Prudential Holmes & Kennedy; Century 21 V.J.F.
28-year-old colonial; eat-in-kitchen, living-room fireplace, walk-in closets, deck, 0.58-acre level lot; taxes $14,251; listed at $769,000. Broker: Prudential Holmes & Kennedy.

New town house; cathedral ceilings, eat-in-kitchen, living-room fireplace, walk-in closets, deck, 0.095-acre lot; taxes $8,000; listed at $1.099 million. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Residential; Prudential Holmes & Kennedy.

7-year-old colonial; marble fireplace, cook's kitchen, granite counters, cathedral ceilings, h/w floors, gated development, 0.27-acre lot; taxes $22,709; listed at $1.45 million. Brokers: Sotheby's; Houlihan Lawrence.

45-year-old vinyl-sided ranch; dining area, oak cabinets, family room, den, 6-panel doors, h/w floors, patio, 1.4-acre lot; taxes $5,200; listed at $279,000. Brokers: Hudson Heritage; Prudential Rand.

22-year-old stucco raised ranch; eat-in kitchen with pantry, family room, fireplace, cathedral ceilings, c/a, 2-car garage, 0.27-acre lot; taxes $5,482; listed at $499,000. Brokers: IBNA Spoon River; Prudential Rand.

3-year-old stucco and stone house; 2-story foyer, pantry, den, family room, finished basement, hot tub, h/w floors, 3-car garage, 0.81-acre lot; taxes $15,400; listed at $829,900. Brokers: ARC; Century 21 Prestige.

147-year-old wood colonial; family room, library, guest suite, office, 2 fireplaces, 4-car garage, 4-stall barn, art studio, 1.02-acre lot; taxes $12,000; listed at $995,000. Brokers: Mason Samett; Prudential Rand.

New stucco colonial; granite counters, family room, library, 3 fireplaces, Brazilian cherry floors, cathedral ceilings, river views and access, 0.63-acre lot; taxes $7,477; listed at $2.2 million. Broker: Housepad.com.

81-year-old colonial; fixer-upper, nonworking gas fireplace, den, deck, 2-car detached garage; 38-by-135-ft. lot; taxes $5,850; listed at $207,500 (multiple bids). Brokers: Danzi & Rokas; Prudential N.J. Properties.

57-year-old Cape Cod; renovated in 2006, granite counters, refinished h/w floors, living-room fireplace, 1-car attached garage; 117-by-60-ft. lot; taxes $6,352; listed at $449,000. Brokers: Weichert; Burgdorff ERA.
New colonial; eat-in kitchen w/pantry, high ceilings, office, unfinished full basement, 1-car attached garage; 50-by-98-ft. lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $699,000. Brokers: Castle; Weichert.

New colonial; island kitchen w/fireplace, family-room fireplace, study, patio, deck w/surround sound, 3-car garage; 0.5-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $1.189 million. Brokers: Preakness; Coldwell Banker.
5-year-old town-house condo; 3 levels, foyer, h/w floors, crown moldings, high ceilings, cherry kitchen cabinets, granite counters; taxes $22,301; listed at $1.295 million. Broker: Lois Schneider.

1,080-sq.-ft. 25-year-old town-house condo; living-room fireplace, balcony, tennis courts and playground in complex; common charge $238; taxes $2,925; listed at $279,000. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

12-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; eat-in kitchen, pantry, family-room fireplace, vaulted ceilings, h/w floors, c/a, 2-car garage, 2.05-acre lot; taxes $8,572; listed at $579,000. Broker: Prudential Connecticut.

20-year-old wood colonial; dining room, renovated baths and eat-in kitchen, family room, den, fireplace, c/a, h/w floors, 3-car garage, 2-acre lot; taxes $9,965; listed at $774,500. Brokers: Keller Williams; Neumann.

2,000-sq.-ft. 32-year-old town-house condo; renovated kitchen, h/w floors, expanded deck; common charge $351; taxes $6,260; listed at $1.15 million. Brokers: Coldwell Banker Greenwich; Prudential Connecticut.

New wood colonial; den, playroom, 3 fireplaces, coffered ceilings, custom moldings, whirlpool, 3-car garage, 2.04-acre lot; taxes not yet assessed; listed at $2.545 million. Brokers: Realty Seven; Coldwell Banker Wilton.
